Alex Wa's Blog
Blog Archive

Hey! I'm Alex Wa, a 2nd year Math and CS major at Yale, YES Scholar and Soma fellow. My research currently span RL and NLP, and I'm also interested in ML systems and model architecture.

Currently, I'm developing RL environments in Prime Intellect's RL Residency and researching RL4LLMs and rubrics as rewards with the Yale NLP lab. Previously, I've done research in geometric algebra (APOLLO Labs), algebraic topology (SUMaC '23), abstract algebra (SUMaC '22), and biostatistics (Emory).

In my free time, I draw, help design The Veritas Search, drink matcha and boba, playing board games, and learning pen-spinning.
